hobbies: using smartphones for plant care apps
message: I find great joy in tending to my plants, both in my garden and in this greenhouse. With the help of my smartphone, I can monitor their growth, check for pests, and even learn new techniques. Technology and nature go hand in hand for me. I believe that staying connected with the natural world, even through digital tools, enriches our lives. Whether I'm watering a seedling or reading an article about soil health, every moment spent with plants brings me peace and purpose.
cn_prompt: 画面中的老爷爷正站在绿意盎然的植物背景前，双手拿着手机，对着镜头讲话，镜头固定。
en_prompt: The elderly man in the image is standing in front of a lush green plant background, holding a smartphone with both hands, speaking directly to the camera. The shot is static.
